item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. A DSL for peephole transformation rules of integer operations in the PyPy JIT (32 points | 2 comments)
3. Show HN: A macOS Client for HuggingFace Chat (6 points | discuss)
